metadata.name: Gossamer Academy #1
metadata.description:
You are a warrior in training. As you grow through the Gossamer Academy you will have the choice: dream or nightmare.
Each warrior provides exclusive access to a world overlapping with Web 3, TV, and a AAA game franchise. Gossamer NFTs also provide first-access to all future BRON NFT projects.
Revealing in August.
Follow on social to continue the story.
